channel.title: Sand generators
channel.description:
People have started building them, it's effectively a dupe but on a block thats somewhat worthless, but useful. We banned other dupes, but there appears to be a consensus that this one is allowed.
Thoughts?

item.title: Sand generators
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

let them use it, sand wont have any impact on the economy

Read full topic

item.title: Sand generators
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Were not sending the message dupe every block but the ones worth something, were sending the message you can dupe gravel and sand. Since were using a fixed size map and I don’t want the deserts to look like shit AND we couldn’t stop them if we wanted to we might as well go ahead and accept it until 1.3.

Read full topic

item.title: Sand generators
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

We allowed them in 1.8.1 because they were never really brought to my attention in 1.8.1. The message we’re sending right now is: Dupe every block but the ones worth something. I think the message should be: Don’t dupe AT ALL.

Pretty sure they’re not a legitimate part of the game, otherwise they wouldn’t have been patched.

Read full topic

item.title: Sand generators
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

We allowed this in 1.8.1 when sand generators were simple to make, I can’t see why we would suddenly disallow them. I can confirm however that in the latest snapshot the design people are using is fixed.

Read full topic
